item.title: Hands-On: Debunking GenAI Myths with Real-Life Examples
item.description: Uncover and challenge common misconceptions about GenAI with hands-on examples that demonstrate its capabilities and boundaries.

item.title: Breaking Down AI Myths: What GenAI Can and Can't Do for You
item.description: Uncover the truths behind popular AI myths and see where GenAI excels—and where it doesn’t—so you can make the most of this tech in your daily life.

item.title: Hands-On: Deepen Your Learning Journey with GenAI
item.description: Learn how to use GenAI as a conversational partner for learning and discovery, refining answers for deeper understanding.

item.title: Common GenAI Mistakes and How to Avoid Them
item.description: Explore common mistakes users make with GenAI, and get tips to overcome these obstacles and make AI a helpful companion.

item.title: Hands-On: Create a Personalized Bedtime Story Using GenAI
item.description: Learn how to create a custom bedtime story with AI, complete with your child’s favorite characters and a downloadable format for easy reading.

item.title: Boost Your Creativity with AI
item.description: Explore how AI can be used to help writers generate ideas, craft dialogue, and streamline the creative process.

item.title: Hands-On: Automating Your Routine with GenAI
item.description: Learn how to set up an AI-powered workflow to automate small tasks and reclaim your time.

item.title: AI for Small Wins
item.description: Explore how AI can help automate small, everyday tasks, from meal planning to workout scheduling, to free up your time for the things that matter.

item.title: Hands-On: Using AI for Personal Reflection
item.description: Learn how to use GPT as your personal life coach for reflection and personal growth.

item.title: Exploring Everyday AI Tools
item.description: A guide to beginner-friendly AI tools that act as digital companions, helping you streamline daily tasks and bring your ideas to life.

item.title: Hands-On: Using AI to Make Better and More Informed Choices
item.description: A hands-on guide to using Generative AI to make better decisions, focusing on role-play scenarios to tailor responses to individual needs.

item.title: Starting the AI Journey
item.description: A beginner-friendly introduction to Generative AI, focusing on learning and exploration to integrate AI into daily life.

item.title: The GenAI Edge Newsletter
